david1 --> You still have _plenty_ of mp3's to download, don be such a whining sissy.

FLAC can be converted to any lossy or lossless format, doing the same with mp3 would only further destroy the music. Posting in FLAC gives the downloaders a choice to use whatever format the like.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FLAC
http://flac.sourceforge.net/
